H0.text: who appoints the members of the board of governors of the federal reserve. The Federal Reserve Chairman

H1.text: who appoints the members of the board of governors of the federal reserve. The Secretary of the Treasury

H2.text: who appoints the members of the board of governors of the federal reserve. The Senate Banking Committee

H3.text: who appoints the members of the board of governors of the federal reserve. the President

A4.text: Each governor is appointed by the president of the United States and confirmed by the Senate to staggered 14-year terms

A5.text: The chair and vice chair are appointed by the president from among the sitting Governors
